title: Coyote and the Star
subtle: Pourquoi Tale (fiction), 1,134 words, Level P (Grade 2), Lexile 610L
description: Coyote and the Star is an adaptation of a Klamath Indian pourquoi tale. Coyote falls in love with a star and tries many ways to get the star
highFrequencyWords: coyote, gazed, howl, impact, resilient, vowed
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
phonics: Compound Words                : Identify and use compound words
